name: MyVillageSivagalai
0:
”Alexa, tell My Village Facts to give me a fun fact about a village.”
”Alexa, ask My Village Facts to give me a random village fact”
”Alexa, tell My Village Facts to share a village fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my village
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask for Village Facts, and learn about what really matters, like dark matter.

Village Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Village Facts" or "Alexa, open Village Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
